row.process:
:SET &PROGRAM# = "FP8.FileImport.sh" :SET &OPTIONS# = "-importfolder=&IMPORTFOLDER# -deletedonefolder=&DELETEDONEFOLDER#" :SET &RUNDIR# = ""
:PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1="&TITLE#" :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY2="&DOCCLASSPREFIX#"
! Alle xml Variablen definieren :SET &RDOSDOCCLASS# = &RDOSDOCCLASS# :SET &RDOSFOLDER# = &RDOSFOLDER# :SET &FPOSDOCCLASS# = &FPOSDOCCLASS# :SET &FPOSFOLDER# = &FPOSFOLDER# :SET &TITLE# = &TITLE# :SET &SACHGEBIET# = &SACHGEBIET# :SET &BESCHREIBUNG# = &BESCHREIBUNG# :SET &ABLAGEORT# = &ABLAGEORT# :SET &DOKUMENTENTYP# = &DOKUMENTENTYP# :SET &FACHBEREICH# = &FACHBEREICH#
cat << __EOF__ |tee &WORKDIR#/default.import.xml <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <p8fileimport xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance' xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation='p8fileimport_schema.xsd'>
<storage> <record> <objectstore>RDOS</objectstore> <documentclass>&RDOSDOCCLASS#</documentclass> <folder>&RDOSFOLDER#</folder> </record> : IF &FPOSDOCCLASS# <> "" <recordmanager> <objectstore>FPOS</objectstore> <documentclass>&FPOSDOCCLASS#</documentclass> <folder>&FPOSFOLDER#</folder> </recordmanager> : ENDIF </storage>
<descriptor> <metadata> <dokumenttitel>\$\$\$FILENAME\$\$\$</dokumenttitel> : IF &TITLE# <> "" <attributes> <name>Titel</name> <stringValue>&TITLE#</stringValue> </attributes> : ENDIF <attributes> <name>ppt_Dokumentenname</name> <stringValue>\$\$\$FILENAME\$\$\$</stringValue> </attributes> : IF &SACHGEBIET# <> "" <attributes> <name>Sachgebiet</name> <stringValue>&SACHGEBIET#</stringValue> </attributes> : ENDIF : IF &BESCHREIBUNG# <> "" <attributes> <name>ppt_Beschreibung</name> <stringValue>&BESCHREIBUNG#</stringValue> </attributes> : ENDIF : IF &ABLAGEORT# <> "" <attributes> <name>ablageort</name> <stringValue>&ABLAGEORT#</stringValue> </attributes> : ENDIF <attributes> <name>ppt_Erstelldatum</name> <dateValue>\$\$\$FILENAME_CREATED_DATE\$\$\$</dateValue> </attributes> <attributes> <name>Erstellzeit</name> <stringValue>\$\$\$FILENAME_CREATED_TIME\$\$\$</stringValue> </attributes> : IF &DOKUMENTENTYP# <> "" <attributes> <name>Dokumententyp</name> <stringValue>&DOKUMENTENTYP#</stringValue> </attributes> : ENDIF : IF &FACHBEREICH# <> "" <attributes> <name>Fachbereich</name> <stringValue>&FACHBEREICH#</stringValue> </attributes> : ENDIF </metadata> </descriptor>
</p8fileimport> __EOF__
:INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB
